content: not heel gusset dpn directions to twist your sts switch to mc with empty dpn and rs facing this will be called needle 1 pick-up and k16 sts from heel selvedge cuff dpn & magic loop directions work the 33 sts from the instep in pattern these sts will round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end be on needle 2 & 3 with empty dpn this will be called this establishes 1x1 ribbing needle 4 pick-up and k16 sts from heel selvedge k9 pm this m will be the new beginning of round starting repeat round 1 until work measures approx 1 25 / 3 cm at center back of heel leg dpn & magic loop directions round 1 k to 3 sts from end of needle 1 k2tog k1 change to cc work instep sts from needle 2 & 3 in established pattern round 1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end at beg of needle 4 k1 ssk k to end 2 sts decreased this establishes k3 p1 ribbing round 2 work in established pattern to end repeat round 1 until work measures approx 5 / 1 25 cm from repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 65 total sts remain color change right sock only change to mc and continue in k3 p1 rib until work round 1 k to 3 sts from end of needle 1 k2tog k1 measures approx 25 / 75 cm from color change work instep sts from needle 2 & 3 in established pattern on needle 4 k to end 1 st decreased change to cc and continue in k3 p1 rib until work measures approx 5 / 1 25 cm from color change left sock only round 1 k to end of needle 1 work instep sts from needle cut cc and change to mc and continue in k3 p1 rib 2 & 3 in established pattern at beg of needle 4 k1 ssk k to until work measures approx 8 / 20 cm from co edge end 1 st decreased heel flap dpn & magic loop directions 64 sts rem continue in mc k3 p1 3x k3 turn work cut mc and switch to cc p31 turn work if necessary rearrange sts on dpns to have 16 sts on each needle working only on these 31 sts placing remaining 33 sts on spare dpn or cable if using magic loop method continue heel gusset magic loop directions as follows switch to mc and with rs facing pick-up and k16 sts from heel selvedge pm work the 33 sts from the instep row 1 rs *k1 sl-wyib repeat from * to last st k1 in pattern pulling sts onto cable and establishing magic loop row 2 ws sl-wyif p to last st sl-wyif half way across instep pm and pick up and k16 sts from heel selvedge k9 and pull sts onto cable the middle of the 18 repeat these two row 15 more times heel sts center back heel
